info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.pbac.catalog

put.description: Retrieves service catalog tailor for the currently logged-in user.

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

addon_service_group_name.description:
Addon Service Group Name
x-displayName: "Addon Service Group Name"
Name of the addon service group.

display_name.title:
disolay_name
x-displayName: "Display Name"
Display Name of the addon service

catalogListRequest.description: List request message. Includes optional filter.
catalogListRequest.title: ListRequest

use_case_filter.description:
Exclusive with [workspace_filter]
 Filter by use case name. If empty, all use cases are returned.

Example: ` "f5xc-base"`
use_case_filter.title: Use case filter

workspace_filter.description:
Exclusive with [use_case_filter]
 Filter by workspace name. If empty, all workspaces are returned.
 The use case response field will contain the use case of the workspace and no other use cases.

Example: ` "f5xc-base"`
workspace_filter.title: Workspace Filter

addon_services.description: List of Addon Services. The key is the addon service name.
addon_services.title: Addon Services

services.description: List of result services (addons). The key is the service name.
services.title: Services

system_management.title: System Management

use_cases.description: List of result use cases. The key is the use case name.
use_cases.title: Use Cases

workspaces.description: List of result tiles (workspaces). The key is the workspace name.
workspaces.title: Workspaces

schemaAddonServiceAccess.description:
x-displayName: "Addon Service Access"
State of access into service

 - AS_AC_NONE: x-displayName: "None"
default state
This can mean that addon service is not subscribed or is in pending subscription.
 - AS_AC_ALLOWED: x-displayName: "Allow"
access is allowed
 - AS_AC_PBAC_DENY: x-displayName: "PBAC Deny"
Addon service is not allowed as part of current plan
 - AS_AC_PBAC_DENY_UPGRADE_PLAN: x-displayName: "PBAC Deny - Upgrade plan"
Addon service is not allowed as part of current plan. To enable it, user is requested to uprade the plan
 - AS_AC_PBAC_DENY_CONTACT_SALES: x-displayName: "PBAC Deny - Contact Sales"
Addon service is not allowed as part of current plan. To enable or to find out more, user is requested to contact sales
 - AS_AC_PBAC_DENY_AS_AC_EOL: x-displayName: "PBAC Deny - End of  Life"
Addon service is not allowed as part of current plan as it is discontinued. User is requested to contact sales discuss alternatives
schemaAddonServiceAccess.title: AddonServiceAccess

schemaAddonServiceGroupStatus.description:
x-displayName: "Addon Service group status"
Status of addon service group

 - ASG_STATUS_UNKNOWN: x-displayName: "Unknown"
Unknown
 - ASG_STATUS_AVAILABLE: x-displayName: "Available"
Addon service group is available for subscription
 - ASG_STATUS_REQUESTED: x-displayName: "Requested"
Addon service group has been requested and subscription is pending
 - ASG_STATUS_ENABLED: x-displayName: "Enabled"
Addon service group has been subscribed (enabled)
 - ASG_STATUS_NA_CONTACT_US: x-displayName: "Contact Us"
Addon service group is not allowed in the current plan. User is requested to contact sales to discuss their use case/ alternatives
 - ASG_STATUS_NA_DEPRECATED: x-displayName: "Deprecated"
Addon service group is not allowed in the current plan as it is discontinued
 - ASG_STATUS_NA_UPGRADE_PLAN: x-displayName: "Upgrade plan"
Addon servicve group is not allowed in the current plan. User is requested to upgrade plan to enable it
 - ASG_STATUS_SUBSCRIPTION_ERROR: x-displayName: "Subscription error"
Subscription error
schemaAddonServiceGroupStatus.title: AddonServiceGroupStatus

schemaAddonServiceState.description:
x-displayName: "Addon Service State"
State of a service

 - AS_NONE: x-displayName: "None"
default state
 - AS_PENDING: x-displayName: "Pending Subscription"
initiated subscription request and is pending to activate (requested).
 - AS_SUBSCRIBED: x-displayName: "Subscribed"
successfully subscribed
 - AS_ERROR: x-displayName: "Error"
service subscription request ended up in error state.
schemaAddonServiceState.title: AddonServiceState

schemaAddonServiceTierType.description:
x-displayName: "Addon Service Tier"
AddonServiceTierType is for identifying the tier of an addon service

 - NO_TIER: none

x-displayName: "none"
when tier is not applicable for a addon service
 - BASIC: basic

x-displayName: "basic"
basic
 - STANDARD: standard

x-displayName: "standard"
standard
 - ADVANCED: advanced

x-displayName: "advanced"
advanced
 - PREMIUM: premium

x-displayName: "premium"
premium
schemaAddonServiceTierType.title: AddonServiceTierType

schemaFeatureTag.description:
x-displayName: "Feature Tag"
FeatureTag is for identifying the tag of feature of an offering (new, preview)

 - NONE: x-displayName: "Unknown"
Unknown (undefined) feature tag
 - NEW: x-displayName: "New"
New feature tag
 - PREVIEW: x-displayName: "Preview"
Preview feature tag
 - PRIVATE_PREVIEW: x-displayName: "Private Preview"
Private preview feature tag
schemaFeatureTag.title: FeatureTag
